root.name: Fuyu no Rondo
root.description: System RequirementsOperating System: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista CPU: Pentium III 1GHz or higher (at least 2.4GHz is recommended) Memory: For Vista: 512MB or higher (1GB recommended). For the others: 256MB minimum (512MB recommended) Hard Drive Space: 3GB minimum. Video Card: Should support at least a resolution of 1024 x 768, 24-bit color Windows Media Player 7.1 or higher Media: DVD-ROM
